ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is indeed the Truth of Certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is indeed the ultimate truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That indeed is the absolute truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the absolute Truth and certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is indeed an utmost certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this! This is an absolute truth with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely this is a certain truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely this is the truth of certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is indeed the indubitable truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this! this is the very truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, this is the Very Truth and Certainly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, this! This is an absolute Truth with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, this is the certain truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, this is the true certainty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:95] This indeed is the certain truth (haqqu’l-yaqīn: an example of an adjectivally qualified noun being annexed to its adjective).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! This) which We have described (is certain truth) that will undoubtedly take place.
